mapper.select: /* getSignInfoList */ SELECT CSI.SIGN_SEQ AS SIGN_SEQ, CSI.FORM_COMP_NAME AS FORM_COMP_NAME, CSI.SI_NAME AS SI_NAME, CSI.CI_KIND_VAL AS CI_KIND_VAL, CSI.ACTIVE AS ACTIVE, CSI.USE_FORM_VAL AS USE_FORM_VAL, CSI.USE_FORM_NAME AS USE_FORM_NAME, CSI.REMARK_VAL AS REMARK_VAL, CONCAT(CFI.FILE_PATH, CFI.FILE_UUID) AS FILE_NO FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_SIGN_INFO CSI LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO CFI ON CONCAT('sign_', CSI.SIGN_SEQ) = CFI.CONTENT_ID WHERE CSI.ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY CFI.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
/* setSignInfoIns */ INSERT INTO CAM_COMMON.DJ_SIGN_INFO ( FORM_COMP_NAME, SI_NAME, CI_KIND_VAL, ACTIVE, USE_FORM_VAL, USE_FORM_NAME, REMARK_VAL ) VALUES ( #{formCompName}, #{siName}, #{ciKindVal}, #{active}, #{useFormVal}, #{useFormName}, #{remarkVal} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_COMMON' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_SIGN_INFO'
mapper.update: /* setSignInfoUpd */ UPDATE CAM_COMMON.DJ_SIGN_INFO SET FORM_COMP_NAME = #{formCompName}, SI_NAME = #{siName}, CI_KIND_VAL = #{ciKindVal}, ACTIVE = #{active}, USE_FORM_VAL = #{useFormVal}, USE_FORM_NAME = #{useFormName}, REMARK_VAL = #{remarkVal} WHERE SIGN_SEQ = #{signSeq}
